name: Coffee Break (Web)
description:
Now playable on your browser while you're on a break: an office simulator that has everything you miss about going to the office:

  • Looming project deadline!
  • Pile of dishes in the sink!
  • Fixing a broken printer!
  • Talkative rodent co-workers!
  • Free coffee!

Gameplay is about 15-30 minutes, with 3 possible endings. Created for the MCPG Gallery Project, 2020.
